entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 10 except minus 15 in low lying areas. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Tuesday 14 February 2023
